thread.title: Illinois gun-rights group to game Chicago gun buyback effort
thread.title_full: Illinois gun-rights group to game Chicago gun buyback effort - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Illinois gun-rights group to game Chicago gun buyback effort
text: CHICAGO (AP) - An Illinois gun-rights advocate says he will take advantage of an effort by Rahm Emanuel to implement a $250,000 gun buyback program the Chicago mayor says is designed to get illegal guns off the city's streets. Champaign-based Guns Save Life executive director John Boch says he and ... ...
